actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wilderness Act (78 Stat. 890) to preserve the unique and irreplaceable ecological values of wilderness areas by providing for the termination of the application of mining and mineral leasing laws to, and of continuous mineral prospecting activities in, such areas.

summary.text: Provides for the termination of the application of mining and mineral leasing laws to, and of continuing mineral prospecting activities in wilderness areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wilderness Act (78 Stat. 890) to preserve the unique and irreplaceable ecological values of wilderness areas by providing for the termination of the application of mining and mineral leasing laws to, and of continuous mineral prospecting activities in, such areas.
